https://tmrev.io/movie/202132-50 Children: The Rescue Mission of Mr. and Mrs. Kraus 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fR8Key3XJuyG5d24K3DVPFmRNir.jpg In the spring of 1939, Gilbert and Eleanor Kraus embarked on a risky and unlikely mission. Traveling into the heart of Nazi Germany, they rescued 50 Jewish children from Vienna and brought them to the United States. 50 Children: The Rescue Mission of Mr. and Mrs. Kraus
